featuredArticle.title: Year in Review: The 10 Stories That Defined 2025
featuredArticle.excerpt: From breakthrough AI developments to geopolitical shifts, 2025 has been a year of transformation. We look back at the stories that shaped our world and set the stage for the challenges and opportunities of 2026.
